docs.lead_paragraph: With the cold weather close at hand, there is for the tenants of New York's innumerable flat and apartment houses -- and for the owners of those houses -- a particular interest in the decision just rendered by the Supreme Court in tile case of OLLWERTER VS. ESCHER.
docs.abstract: Comment on Ollwerter vs Eschee decision providing that a landlord who does not keep his apts habitable is not entitled to rent money, NYC
